artist: William Bailey Text by Willa Cather The Limited Editions Club Text: The Anthoensen Press, Portland, Maine Prints: Black Box Collotype, Inc. & The Heron Press (etchings)
description: binding: half violet-brown leather, gold-stamped lettering, lilac cotton sides printed with floral design in dark purple; slipcase: mauve paper over cardboard, gold-stamped lettering; type: Linotype Caslon Old Face; gilt-edged (22 kt. gold); 118 pp.
medium: Etching and lithographic reproductions of pen and ink drawings
title: A Lost Lady
